title: Confinement Is Solitary

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Clear all current Confined, and roleblock a target, and also roleblock all players who targeted them.
- Clear all current Confined from all evil players. You will learn who is affected.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Whilst you are alive, all roleblocks instead grant the Confined status, which fails the targetâ€™s actions and fails all non-killing visits to them. When a Confined player is protected or killed, or you use your ability, all current Confined is cleared. Otherwise, it lasts until you die.
- If Confined player attempts to vote, their vote is cancelled (and majority lowers), and their Confined status is revealed.
- Roleblock immune.
- You may only use one ability per night.
- This role cannot exist in a game with the Everfrost.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the town lose the game
